alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 1:58PM CDT until May 25 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Central Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moss, or near Stringer, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Moss around 205 PM CDT. Vernon around 215 PM CDT. Heidelberg around 220 PM CDT. Paulding and Stafford Springs around 225 PM CDT. Rose Hill around 235 PM CDT. Orange around 240 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Soso. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
